object_name.value: Validate document does not have annotations

title.value: Ensures a document does not have outstanding PDF annotations or native annotations to be taken into account before it is made 'Effective'.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

This document still has annotations on it (see ''Relations'' tab for details). Before making the document ''Effective/Final'', delete the annotations, or revise the document to take account of the annotation comments and resubmit it for review / approval as appropriate. (''Effective/Final'' versions of documents should not contain annotations, as these are not part of the approved content.)
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select parent_id from dm_relation where parent_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and (relation_name = 'DM_ANNOTATE' or relation_name = 'D2_ANNOTATE'))
